Sentencas: Electrical output behaviour obtained on solid oxide fuel cell stacks, based on planar anode supported cells (50 or 100 cm(2) active area) and metallic interconnects, is reported.
Titulo: Dynamic behaviour of SOFC short stacks

Sentencas: Stacks (1-12 cells) have been operated with cathode air and anode hydrogen flows between 750 and 800 degrees C operating temperature.
Titulo: Dynamic behaviour of SOFC short stacks

Sentencas: At first polarisation, an activation phase (increase in power density) is typically observed, ascribed to the cathode but not clarified.
Titulo: Dynamic behaviour of SOFC short stacks

Sentencas: Activation may extend over days or weeks.
Titulo: Dynamic behaviour of SOFC short stacks

Sentencas: The materials are fairly resistant to thermal cycling.
Titulo: Dynamic behaviour of SOFC short stacks

Sentencas: A 1-cell stack cycled five times in 4 days at heating/cooling rates of 100-300 Kh(-1), showed no accelerated degradation.
Titulo: Dynamic behaviour of SOFC short stacks

Sentencas: In a 5-cell stack, open circuit voltage (OCV) of all cells remained constant after three full cycles (800-25 degrees C).
Titulo: Dynamic behaviour of SOFC short stacks

Sentencas: Power output is little affected by air flow but markedly influenced by small fuel flow variation.
Titulo: Dynamic behaviour of SOFC short stacks

Sentencas: Fuel utilisation reached 88% in one 5-cell stack test.
Titulo: Dynamic behaviour of SOFC short stacks

Sentencas: Performance homogeneity between cells lay at +/- 4-8% for three different 5- or 6-cell stacks, but was poor for a 12-cell stack with respect to the border cells.
Titulo: Dynamic behaviour of SOFC short stacks

Sentencas: Degradation of a 1-cell stack operated for 5500 h showed clear dependence on operating conditions (cell voltage, fuel conversion), believed to be related to anode reoxidation (Ni).
Titulo: Dynamic behaviour of SOFC short stacks

Sentencas: A 6-cell stack (50 cm(2) cells) delivering 100W(el) at 790 degrees C (1 kW(el) L(-1) or 0.34 W cm(-2)) went through a fuel supply interruption and a thermal cycle, with one out of the six cells slightly underperforming after these events.
Titulo: Dynamic behaviour of SOFC short stacks

Sentencas: This cell was eventually responsible (hot spot) for stack failure.
Titulo: Dynamic behaviour of SOFC short stacks
Dynamic behaviour of SOFC short stacks
